channel.title: [Glitch] Health and Suit Stations
channel.description: A few times in the game I've found suit and health dispensers that don't continue to dispense health when I hold my use key. Just now in Lambda Core, in the room the Scientists use to brief you on Xen (and the asshole security guard), I had to repeatedly tap the use key to get my suit and health topped off because the dispensers inexplicably refused to keep going on a use key hold. The lions share of dispensers work fine throughout the mod, though. Perhaps it's an incidental glitch, but the ones in the aforementioned scene were all consistent with this problem. Anyone else run into this/ know how to fix it?

item.title: [Glitch] Health and Suit Stations
item.dc:creator: KyuuGryphon
item.description:
I think I’ve had this happen to me before. Are you standing right in front of the charger?

I’ve found that if I’m looking at it at an angle/looking at the edge it’d heal me 2 points, then stop, over and over again.

If you mean something else, then I haven’t had it happen to me, sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: [Glitch] Health and Suit Stations
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
A few times in the game I’ve found suit and health dispensers that don’t continue to dispense health when I hold my use key. Just now in Lambda Core, in the room the Scientists use to brief you on Xen (and the asshole security guard), I had to repeatedly tap the use key to get my suit and health topped off because the dispensers inexplicably refused to keep going on a use key hold. The lions share of dispensers work fine throughout the mod, though. Perhaps it’s an incidental glitch, but the ones in the aforementioned scene were all consistent with this problem. Anyone else run into this/ know how to fix it?
